what: Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from avom — scale_colour_avom
title: Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from avom — scale_colour_avom
text: Returns vector colors forming cohesive palette. Current palettes include: Nominal: gruvbox_light, gruvbox_dark Diverging: gruvbox_div

title: Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from avom — scale_colour_avom
code: scale_colour_avom(palette = "gruvbox_light", direction = 1, ...)  scale_color_avom(palette = "gruvbox_light", direction = 1, ...)  scale_fill_avom(palette = "gruvbox_light", direction = 1, ...)

title: Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from avom — scale_colour_avom
text: palette Name palette use. direction Orientation palette. -1, order colors reversed. ... Additional arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale()

title: Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from avom — scale_colour_avom
code: ggplot2::ggplot(data = mtcars,        mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg, y = hp, color = as.factor(am))) +        ggplot2::geom_point() +        scale_color_avom()

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
text: ggplot2 theme based gruvbox color palette Fira Sans font.

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
text: panel.grid.major Controls major leading lines. Expects ggplot2::element_line() line function. panel.grid.minor Controls minor leading lines. ... arguments passed ggplot2::theme().

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
code: if (FALSE) { ggplot2::ggplot(data = mtcars,                 mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +          ggplot2::geom_point() +          theme_avom()          }

title: avom 0.1
text: Added color palettes based gruvbox (scale_color_avom() scale_fill_avom()) Added ggplot2 based gruvbox (theme_avom())
